title: Residential neighborhood, near Target, N. Berkeley BART
posting_body: Spacious one bedroom, one bath ground floor unit in quite residential neighborhood near Target, N. Berkeley BART, Trader Joes and University Ave. bus lines; tiled kitchen and bath, gas stove and heating, carpeting; lots of natural light; freshly painted w new carpeting.
Well maintained, quiet, owned and managed locally by owner.
Off street parking may be avail.
